oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An extract about an Egyptian folktale, taken from a book of Russian Folktales by Ralston, which reminded Lloyd of the |xam's 'heart-falling-down' stories. 1) This story is found in Book II-37.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Extract from 'Russian Folk Tales' by W.R.S Ralston; pp.111-113: 'Something which reminds me in a degree of the Bushmen's expressions about the heart falling down'; referring to an Egyptian tale
